name: Shooty Triangle 2
description:
Shooty Triangle is a game Where u shoot squares , for now there is only one weapon which is an assault rifle 

there are 2 power-up for now
-PEPSI:Makes Your Fire rate much more faster

-SLOW MO:  Slows downtime and makes the game cooler

i hope you enjoy mine and my friends game 

also download the font  because its importaint
